professional_summary: Database Administrator with expertise in SQL Server optimization and database management.

key_responsibilities: Developed against databases to drive business solutions.
Collaborated with developers to identify opportunities for data structure improvement.
Wrote database queries and SQL utilities to perform data extract
Generated reports to validate assumptions and recommend solutions.
Established and implemented best practices; optimized existing queries to perform better against servers.
Mastered SQL Server in less than one year.
Recognized for exemplary work as lead DBA on multiple projects; managed databases for cross-functional teams.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Business Administration in Management Information Systems
education.institution: Shippensburg University of Pennsylvania - Shippensburg, PA
